frameworks: Terraform (HashiCorp) — implied by docker image and init logs
dependencies: Terraform providers (from source/init_validate_stdout.txt): hashicorp/aws (~> 6.27.0), hashicorp/archive (>= 2.0.0), hashicorp/local, hashicorp/tls, hashicorp/http
architectural_resources: Terraform execution environment (containerized via Docker Compose)
AWS account credentials usage via mounted ~/.aws and AWS_PROFILE (docker-compose.yml)
AWS VPC networking (implied by README: “modify variables.tf according to the VPC configuration”)
Security Group / IP allowlisting (implied by README: access only from runner’s global IP)
SSH key pair for EC2 access (source/.security/my-net-keypair.id_rsa referenced in README)
Nginx web server + PHP-FPM on Amazon Linux 2 (provisioning script source/nginx-php-inst.sh)
